Two truths are equivalent (deduction rule).  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2012.)

 Two truths are equivalent (deduction rule).  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2012.)  (Revised by NM, 29-Jan-2013.)
statement:
2thd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
2thd.2 $e |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
2thd $p |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
